name: Enumerate allocated files and folders
description: This involves parsing the live file system data structures and reconstructing the file system of the target media or device.
examples: The Sleuth Kit - allows parsing of file system structures
X-Ways Forensics - allows parsing of file system structures
references: Casey, E., Nelson, A. and Hyde, J., 2019. Standardization of file recovery classification and authentication. Digital Investigation, 31, p.100873.
Carrier, B., 2005. File system forensic analysis. Addison-Wesley Professional.
